channel.title: Terms on Seely Street Bed and Breakfast
channel.description: Recent content in Terms on Seely Street Bed and Breakfast

item.title: T&C's
item.description: The Important Small Print Room Prices * All prices quoted are per room per night. * Rates posted are valid unil December 2018. * All rates include Breakfast served each morning between 08.00am and 09.00am. * All rates subject to change without notice. Minimum Stay * There is a minimum stay of 2 nights on Holiday Weekends. Reservations * All reservations must be guaranteed with a Credit Card, in the guests name.
